programme.title: Barry Humphries: The Last Laugh
programme.desc: An intimate, upbeat and honest look back at the life and work of Barry Humphries.

programme.desc: The Chase stars Mark Labbett, Jenny Ryan and Shaun Wallace head to the Greek island of Rhodes and compete to throw the best holiday at the destination.

programme.desc: Join Stephen Mulhern for the game show with only one question as Carol steps up to face the Banker and hopes to take home a life-changing cash prize.

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents racing from Cheltenham and Bangor - the feature race is the first of the season on the Cross-Country Course which sets a unique test for horse and jockey.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Its Rickies turn to take on the Banker - join Stephen Mulhern to find out if he will take home a huge cash prize or become the latest member of the 1p Club.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Steven from Essex, Poppy from Fife, Sharon from London, Luke from Sheffield and thousands of pounds is the small matter of one of the Chasers...

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Kim is helpless, Bob is still sore after being upstaged by Jason Donovan, and Vinny tries to hide his jealousy.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Kit begins to connect the dots in his investigation, Debbie angers Kevin by inviting Carl and Abi to her wedding, and George and Christina are concerned by a report from Gary.

programme.title: The 1% Club Rollover
programme.desc: Lee Mack hosts the spin-off from the quiz where the questions are all about logic and common sense as 100 contestants try to win a jackpot of anything up to 500,000 pounds.

programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James culinary adventure hits the southwest of England with a visit to the vibrant city of Bristol, where he meets up with local chef Romy Gill.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team of gardening experts head to Waltham Abbey to create a tropical escape with a yoga deck and home office at its heart for a selfless leukaemia survivor.

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan are Clare Balding, musical sensation Andy Nyman, royal photographer Chris Jackson, and some very cute reindeer making their Manor Farm debut.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: James Martins Saturday Morning at Christmas
programme.desc: James and chefs Monica Galetti and Atul Kochhar serve up a feast for A Question of Sport star Matt Dawson, and Nicola Lando shares Christmas foodie gifts.

programme.title: John and Lisas Christmas Kitchen
programme.desc: John and Lisa simplify some traditional festive dishes that can be a bit tricky to get right with a menu that includes a gorgeous alternative to Christmas pudding.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents coverage of racing from Cheltenham and Doncaster - the feature meeting is at Cheltenham where the 2025 December Gold Cup is the highlight.

programme.title: For the Love of Dogs with Alison Hammond at Christmas
programme.desc: Alison Hammond returns to Battersea Dogs and Cats Home for a festive special hoping to give its canine residents the best Christmas present possible.

programme.title: Capitals Jingle Bell Ball 2025
programme.desc: Highlights from the UKs biggest Christmas party at The O2 London with artists including Ed Sheeran, Kylie Minogue, RAYE, Louis Tomlinson, Alex Warren and Jessie J.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: A look back at more of Tipping Points most thrilling end games as plucky players and famous faces alike take on the machine for its jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Christmas Special
programme.desc: The Chasers don their glad rags to take on TV legend Vicki Michelle, TV presenter Radzi Chinyanganya, Paralympian Kadeena Cox and Olympian Sir Bradley Wiggins.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programme.desc: One million pounds is up for grabs and six new contestants are lined up to win it - just 15 questions stand in their way as we find out if any of them can do so.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! Coming Out
programme.desc: Ant and Dec are our hosts as the cast of 2025 reunite on Australias Gold Coast to share behind-the-scenes stories and reminisce about their time in camp.
